Reviews.Title: :Laptop
Reviews.Author: Ridgeangel
Reviews.Content: It works perfectly. It came on time and was very simple to set up and get functioning so I could use it very soon.

Reviews.Title: toshiba computer
Reviews.Author: N. Rach
Reviews.Content: This is a great computer.  I needed a windows 7 for my 76 year old mom who wanted to learn to use a computer.  We tried window 8 for her but since no one in my family has much experience with 8 - we found it easier to try to teach her on one we are all familiar with.  Great computer for the money.  Needed to be defraged to speed it up a bit but works like a charm.

Reviews.Title: WOW !!! Right where I wanna be..and should be !
Reviews.Author: Barb D.
Reviews.Content: Let me get the mundane out of the way...I'm comming from an 8yr. old , demo/floor model emachine with xp "media center" -I've never heard o ANY ONE having this edition...ludicrus describes it-.With MicroFFT phasing support out, the processor and hd slooooooWwwing, and internet changes, it was easy to leave the 7/8ths sunken ship...got it to "easy transfer" in about 23 tryzz EEZEE! Soo, its to easy...it's tooo easy to get high ....on this sattelite, WITH OS 7 not eight..no! I wanted a choice...premo laptop (I saw on the news, some big wheels news and gov. types closing these with block Toshiba on the cover) thats lightening fast, with a reconizable windows- not the newest thing- system. GOT IT REFURBISHED, soo its a "FIND"! You will really appreciate this unit and it's price-refurbed toshiba.best all around, cool running, fast and fairly easy to adjust. I bought from Ocean Reef.

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Pentium Processor B960,Mobile Intel HD Graphics with 64MB-1696MB dynamically allocated shared graphics memory,Genuine Windows 7 Home Premium (64-bit), SP1,Color:-Trax Texture in Black
4GB DDR3 1333MHz memory,DVD-SuperMulti drive (+/-R double layer),10/100 Ethernet LAN. Wi-Fi Wireless networking (802.11b/g/n).
640GB Hard drive(5400 rpm),15.6" widescreen HD TruBrite LED Backlit display,Supports 720p content, 1366x768 (HD), 16:9 aspect ratio.
Webcam and microphone,Microphone jack (mono), Standard stereo speakers, Headphone jack (stereo),2-USB (2.0) ports,RGB port,Memory Card Reader,Touch pad pointing device with multi touch control, Standard US keyboard with 10-key pad (Black)
65W (19V 3.42A) Auto-sensing, 100-240V / 50-60Hz input, 6 cell(48Wh) Li-Ion Battery Up to 5.5 hours battery life, Laptops starting at 5.3 lbs.
ProductInfo.Name: Toshiba Satellite C655-S5540 15.6" Laptop (Intel Pentium Processor B960, 4GB RAM, 640GB HDD, DVDRW, WEBCAM, WIFI)
